1.name: Carrier loads
1.desc: The cargo is loaded in the equipment by the carrier.

2.name: Full loads
2.desc: Container to be stuffed or stripped under responsibility and for account of the shipper or the consignee.

3.name: Less than full loads
3.desc: Container to be stuffed and stripped for account and risk of the carrier.

4.name: Shipper loads
4.desc: The cargo is loaded in the equipment by the shipper.

5.name: To be delivered
5.desc: The cargo is to be delivered as instructed.

6.name: To be kept
6.desc: The cargo is to be retained awaiting further instructions.

8.name: Transhipment not allowed
8.desc: Transhipment of goods is not allowed.

11.name: Partial shipment and/or drawing allowed
11.desc: Partial shipment and/or drawing is allowed.

12.name: Partial shipment and/or drawing not allowed
12.desc: Partial shipment and/or drawing is not allowed.

13.name: Carrier unloads
13.desc: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the carrier.

14.name: Shipper unloads
14.desc: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the shipper.

15.name: Consignee unloads
15.desc: The cargo is to be unloaded from the equipment by the consignee.

16.name: Consignee loads
16.desc: The cargo is to be loaded in the equipment by the consignee.

17.name: Exclusive usage of equipment
17.desc: Usage of the equipment is reserved for exclusive use.

18.name: Non exclusive usage of equipment
18.desc: Usage of the equipment is not reserved for exclusive use.

19.name: Direct delivery
19.desc: Consignment for direct delivery to the consignee.

20.name: Direct pick-up
20.desc: Consignment for direct pick-up from the consignee.

21.name: Request for delivery advice services
21.desc: The service provider is requested to advise about delivery.

22.name: Do not arrange customs clearance
22.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is not to arrange customs clearance.

23.name: Arrange customs clearance
23.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange customs clearance.

24.name: Check container condition
24.desc: Condition of the container is to be checked.

27.name: Fork lift holes not required
27.desc: Container needs not to be equipped with pocket holes, but they are allowed.

28.name: Fork lift holes required
28.desc: Container must be equipped with pocket holes.

29.name: Insure goods during transport
29.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is to insure the goods during transport.

30.name: Arrange main-carriage
30.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the main-carriage.

31.name: Arrange on-carriage
31.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the on-carriage.

32.name: Arrange pre-carriage
32.desc: Indication that the recipient of the message is to arrange the pre-carriage.

33.name: Report container safety convention information
33.desc: Indication that the information on the Container Safety Convention plate (CSC-plate) should be reported.

34.name: Check seals
34.desc: Sealing up of the container is to be checked.

35.name: Container must be clean
35.desc: Container is to be released or delivered clean.

36.name: Request for proof of delivery
36.desc: The service provider is requested to provide proof of delivery.

37.name: Request for Customs procedure
37.desc: The service provider is requested to perform Customs procedure.

38.name: Request for administration services
38.desc: The service provider is requested to perform administration services.

39.name: Transport insulated under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
39.desc: Insulated transport under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

40.name: Transport mechanically refrigerated under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
40.desc: Mechanically refrigerated transport under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

41.name: Cool or freeze service, not under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO conditions
41.desc: Cool or freeze service not under Intercontainer INTERFRIGO (joint European railways agreement) conditions.

42.name: Transhipment overseas
42.desc: Transport equipment is to be transferred overseas.

43.name: Station delivery
43.desc: The specified equipment destination station is also the place of delivery of the goods.

44.name: Non station delivery
44.desc: The specified equipment destination station is not the place of delivery of the goods.

45.name: Cleaning or disinfecting
45.desc: The service required is cleaning or disinfection.

46.name: Close ventilation valve
46.desc: The ventilation valve of the equipment must be closed.

47.name: Consignment held for pick-up
47.desc: The consignment is to be held until it is picked up.

48.name: Refrigeration unit check
48.desc: Refrigeration unit has to be checked.

49.name: Customs clearance at arrival country by carrier
49.desc: The carrier is to arrange customs clearance in the arrival country.

50.name: Customs clearance at departure country by carrier
50.desc: The carrier is to arrange customs clearance in the departure country.

51.name: Heating for live animals
51.desc: Heating for live animals has to be provided.

52.name: Goods humidification
52.desc: Humidification of the goods has to be performed.

53.name: Ensure load is secure
53.desc: The load must be checked for correct stowage.

54.name: Open ventilation valve
54.desc: The ventilation valve of the equipment must be opened.

56.name: Tare check by carrier
56.desc: Carrier must check the tare of the equipment and attached items.

58.name: Weighing of goods
58.desc: The goods have to be weighed.
